SELECT COD.CODE , /* 코드 */ COD.UPPER_CODE , /* 상위_코드 */ CASE WHEN CLA.CODE_NM IS NULL THEN COD.CODE_NM ELSE CLA.CODE_NM END AS CODE_NM , /* 코드_명 */
COD.CODE_DC , /* 코드_설명 */ COD.ADIT_VALUE_ONE , /* 추가_값_1 */ COD.ADIT_VALUE_TWO , /* 추가_값_2 */ COD.ADIT_VALUE_THREE , /* 추가_값_3 */ COD.USE_AT , /* 사용_여부 */ COD.DELETE_AT , /* 삭제_여부 */ COD.EXPSR_ORDR , /* 노출_순서 */ DATE_FORMAT(COD.FRST_REGIST_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') FRST_REGIST_DT , /* 최초_등록_일시 */ COD.FRST_REGISTER_ID , /* 최초_등록자_아이디 */ DATE_FORMAT(COD.LAST_UPDT_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') LAST_UPDT_DT , /* 마지막_수정_일시 */ COD.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , /* 마지막_수정자_아이디 */ COD.CODE AS id , /* 트리에 사용될 ID */ CASE WHEN CLA.CODE_NM IS NULL THEN COD.CODE_NM ELSE CLA.CODE_NM END AS text, /* 트리에 사용될 Text */
IFNULL(COD.UPPER_CODE, '#') AS parent , IFNULL(UP_COD.CODE_NM, '최상위 코드') AS UPPER_CODE_NM FROM CO_CODE COD LEFT OUTER JOIN CO_CODE UP_COD ON COD.UPPER_CODE = UP_COD.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN CO_CODE_LANG CLA ON COD.CODE = CLA.CODE AND CLA.LANG_CODE = #{langCode} WHERE COD.DELETE_AT = 'N'
AND COD.UPPER_CODE = #{upperCode}
ORDER BY COD.EXPSR_ORDR ASC

SELECT COD.CODE , /* 코드 */ CLA.LANG_CODE , /* 언어_코드 */ CLA.CODE_NM /* 코드_명 */ FROM CO_CODE COD LEFT OUTER JOIN CO_CODE_LANG CLA ON COD.CODE = CLA.LANG_CODE AND CLA.CODE = #{value} WHERE COD.UPPER_CODE = 'C001000' AND COD.DELETE_AT = 'N' ORDER BY COD.EXPSR_ORDR ASC
SELECT COD.CODE /* 코드 */ FROM CO_CODE COD WHERE COD.UPPER_CODE = #{value} ORDER BY COD.CODE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CO_CODE WHERE code = #{value}
SELECT SUBSTR(COD.CODE, 1, 4) AS MIDDLE_CODE /* 중간 코드 */ FROM CO_CODE COD WHERE SUBSTR(COD.CODE, 1, 1) = #{value} GROUP BY SUBSTR(COD.CODE, 1, 4) ORDER BY SUBSTR(COD.CODE, 1, 4) DESC
SELECT SUBSTR(COD.CODE, 5, 7) AS TAIL_CODE /* 중간 코드 */ FROM CO_CODE COD WHERE SUBSTR(COD.CODE, 1, 4) = #{value} GROUP BY SUBSTR(COD.CODE, 5, 7) ORDER BY SUBSTR(COD.CODE, 5, 7) DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CO_CODE SET DELETE_AT = 'Y' , LAST_UPDT_DT = now() , LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{mngrId} WHERE CODE = #{code} OR CODE IN ( SELECT CODE FROM CO_CODE START WITH UPPER_CODE = #{code} CONNECT BY PRIOR CODE = UPPER_CODE )
SELECT CODE , UPPER_CODE , LEVEL FROM CO_CODE START WITH UPPER_CODE = #{code} CONNECT BY PRIOR CODE = UPPER_CODE
mapper.select: SELECT FCO.FILE_CODE , /* 파일_코드 */ FCO.FILE_CODE_NM , /* 파일_코드_명 */ FCO.UPLOAD_EXTSN_CODE , /* 업로드_확장자_코드 */ COD_EXT.ADIT_VALUE_ONE AS UPLOAD_EXTSN_STR , /* 업로드_확장자_명 */ FCO.MXMM_UPLOAD_SIZE , /* 최대_업로드_사이즈 */ FCO.DWLD_MTHD_CODE , /* 다운로드_방식_코드 */ FCO.DWLD_LC , /* 다운로드_위치 */ FCO.STRE_MTHD_CODE , /* 저장_방식_코드 */ FCO.ENCPT_AT , /* 암호화_여부 */ FCO.USE_AT , /* 사용_여부 */ FCO.DELETE_AT , /* 삭제_여부 */ FCO.EXPSR_ORDR , /* 노출_순서 */ FCO.FRST_REGIST_DT , /* 최초_등록_일시 */ FCO.FRST_REGISTER_ID /* 최초_등록자_아이디 */ FROM CO_FILE_CODE FCO INNER JOIN CO_CODE COD_EXT ON FCO.UPLOAD_EXTSN_CODE = COD_EXT.CODE WHERE FCO.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND FCO.FILE_CODE = #{value} ORDER BY FCO.EXPSR_ORDR ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CO_ID WHERE ID_NO = #{value}
